questions.question: What are coping skills?
answers: Strategies people use to manage stressful or challenging situations in life
Avoiding thinking about things that make people stressed
Happy thoughts used to not think about stress

questions.question: Can coping skills be negative or bad for your long-term health?
What makes coping skills negative or positive?
answers: Negative coping skills will make your health worse over time; positive coping skills make your health worse over time
Negative coping skills will make your health worse over time; positive coping skills have no impact on your health
Negative coping skills will make your health better over time; positive coping skills make your health worse over time
Negative coping skills will make your health worse over time; positive coping skills make your health better over time

questions.question: Myth or fact: It's okay to take extra pain medicine if the first dose doesn't work fast enough
Myth or fact: Over-the-counter medicines can be dangerous if misused
Myth or fact: Over the counter medications, like Tylenol, are safer to use than prescription medications
